mapper.select: SELECT pcno, title, userid, discount, type, target, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as startDay, TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDay FROM promotion_coupon WHERE (sysdate BETWEEN startdate AND endDate) AND pcno NOT IN (SELECT pcno FROM my_coupon WHERE recvid=#{id}) ORDER BY discount DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_coupon VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(MCNO)+1, 1) FROM my_coupon), #{title}, #{pcno}, #{recvid}, #{discount}, #{pcid}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, 0)
